children.value: version 0.9.0! Please see below for what's new in this release.
üèÉ Earn rewards from trading with Liquidity bounties

Liquidity bounties are live! We have partnered with Harmony Protocol to launch the $ONE Makers program, which gives ETH-based rewards for Hummingbot users who provide liquidity to Harmony's $ONE token.
To get started, update Hummingbot to
is the most active Ethereum-based decentralized exchange currently. We have worked closely with their team over the past few weeks to build this connector.
Today, we're happy to announce that the IDEX market connector is ready for use, and all Hummingbot strategies should work on IDEX.
üíª Multiple orders in the pure market making strategy
now allows you to place multiple levels of orders on each side of the order book. This enables market makers to set different tiers of orders with various spreads and order amounts.
section for information on how to use this new feature.
Tracking profits and losses is an essential part of trading. The
section which computes your return expressed as a percentage of your starting inventory balance. We will publish a blog post shortly with the methodology of how we calculate performance.
Thanks to everyone who reported bugs!
Note that we pay bug bounties to anyone who reports a bug that we end up fixing.
Below are the main ones that we fixed in this release:
command now stops duplicate printing output
Fixed a bug that causes exchange rate conversion issues when running the cross-exchange market-making strategy between DDEX and IDEX
Fixed a bug that prevented running the arbitrage and cross-exchange strategies one exchange
Hummingbot now displays warnings if order amounts are lower than minimum order size
Fixed an error that stopped the cross-exchange market making strategy after one trade on Binance
Fixed a bug in the pure market making strategy that flooded trade logs with error messages when balances were insufficient
